## Worm.setNodeValue() method

Sets the value property of the given session. The chosen state can be gathered using the respective API function.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setNodeValue(session: number, value: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  session | number | The Worm session to be targeted. |
|  value | number | The value of the chosen state. |

**Returns:**

void
